Так, так, так
Что же это такое? Что же это за хрень?
Этими вопросами я задаюсь каждый раз, когда вижу данную computer game в разделе, который был создан специально для таких игр под названием "XУИТА".
Что я думаю о данной computer game?
Данная игра была достаточна интересна на выходе. Уникальный геймплей, а так небольшой форс на ютубе сделали своё дело. Но что же произошло спросите вы?
"У разработчика Dead by Daylight умерла мать" - цитата одного из игрков с 2к+ часами (авторитетное и неподкупное мнение человека, который купил все DLC для данной computer game).

Я считаю, что игра идёт по стопам некогда известной игры ДеньВыплат 2. Где игру засрали обоссанными дополнениями, которые наxyй никому не сдались. Игра скатилась и в серверном плане (сервера лагают) и в плане комьюнити (люди тупо сидят, чинят геники и игра превращается в прятки). В плане геймплея скажу так : "Шутка сказанная дважды не становится смешнее" и тут так же, а именно то, что геймплей за 4 года абсолютно никак не эволюционировал и не поменялся. В бете было абсолютно тоже самое, что и сейчас в 2020 году мать его.

И с абсолютно чистой совестью я ставлю PROфессиональный ДИЗЛАЙК и ДИЗРЕСПЕКТ!
Игра, придуманная дебилами для таких же дебилов. 0 развития, 0 интереса, 0 стараний со стороны разработчиков. Просто медленно гниющая помойка

katilin ne yaparsa yapsın oyunu nasıl domine ederse etsin kaybetmeye tasarlanmış olduğu bir oyun siz siz olun katil oynamayın özellikle ruin in değişmesinden sonra iyice gitti oyunda 769 saatim varsa 740 saati katil  ve kazanma oranım ne kadar yüksek olsada surv lar bir hata yapmadığı sürece oyunu sizin almanızın ihtimali çok az fakat oyunun verdiği zevk konusunda söyleyebilecğeğim birşey yok oyun sizi çeken ve kendinde bağlayan bir oyun en az 50-75 saat sıkılmadan oynayabilirsiniz heleki oyuncu bir arkadaş çevreniz varsa  herkese aldırınn ve milleti kesmeye çalışmanın yada gen rush yapıp katile acı çektirmenin tadını çıkartın :)
Great game 10/10 IGN

This review is going to be a bit mixed. Overall I think my recommendation is more leaning towards no than yes. I wish I could leave an 'official maybe'. 

The TLDR version is posted here:

Game is overall fun, but has a lot of frustrating parts. In order for characters to feel 'complete' you have to grind out points to unlock consumable items that enhance your character. It feels often like you have to play some terrible games to get to a few good ones with the better items. It's a fun game, especially with friends, but more times than not lately I've found myself regretting the money I've spent on it and wishing it was still eligible for a refund as the frustration level in the game can be quite high at times. I feel the [b]execution of the immersion is quite good, but the mechanics of the game are terribly frustrating[/b] and lead to wanting to uninstall.

[b]Long Version below[/b]

My review will be more from a killer perspective than a survivor perspective as I do play the killer side more, but am slowly getting into the survivor side also.

The Pros: 

[b]Great game to play with friends![/b]
This game will be a good fit for a group of 4-5 friends in my opinion to play. Definitely enjoy it more with buddies than solo, but I could see it being more fun solo if some of the aspects I dislike (see the cons list) were changed.

[b]Iconic killers feel immersive and real[/b] So far the killers that I've played that come directly from movies, feel like they do a good job of capturing the killer well in the play style, tho some of them a rather confusing to figure out (Lost with freddy/Demogorgen tbh)

Cons:

[b]Blood Web/Addons/Perks[/b]

I honestly do not like the current system of the Addons/Perks/Bloodweb. For those that aren't aware of how it works, you get a 'talent tree' of sorts in the 'blood web' which you purchase the perks and addons (not third party addons, just addons to your weapon/items). The issue I have is some of the characters feel absolutely terrible without these, especially the killers. The Nurse's blink ability on it's own, feels incredibly weak and frustrating to use without the addition to addons to make the spell function what I'd consider more properly. Same thing with Hillbilly's chainsaw, it feels terrible to use to the point where I don't even want to use the ability... I'll admit I have not gone further into their blood webs to get their traits, but why on earth would you have a character that you need to suffer through terrible games to have a few ok ones? The perks/addons are consumable, so you have to repeatedly re-unlock them.

In addition to that, some of the combos that survivors get, especially when they are on voice communications seem nearly impossible to beat and make you as the killer feel not even close to threatening. If you chase the people that seem to never stop healing, the group will be completing generators (to escape) rapidly, if you search for the generator people, the person you did hit is suddenly back at full health. 

[b]Body Blocking[/b] - This is an incredibly frustrating thing and makes you feel not very threatening at all. When you suddenly have three survivors all running at you to body block a hook - I get the idea is to take a hit for your friend to try to save them, but there are times where it just doesn't feel like you're a danger at all to the survivors more just a toy they're playing with. I feel like this could be handled much better. I get the game is meant to be asymmetrical but it does not lead to a feeling of fun mid game when certain perks/addons exist in combos that feel unbeatable. 

I realize there's probably people who've sunk many hours into this game that have perfect plans for how to beat some of the things I've mentioned, but this game does not have a casual mode to play, you're forced to play 'ranked' and after a while of playing you get to a point where you see more of these things than you don't, I've only played about 44 hours at the time of writing this and having encountered more of these than not in the last dozen games, it feels like it is going to be the norm. I've had many moments of regretting having spent money on the game, but I legitimately do enjoy the concept of it, just feel it has a lot of parts that make for a very not fun game experience and lead to me wanting to just not play it all together. I keep giving it more chances as I want to like it, but each time I find myself a bit more frustrated with it and closer to just saying naw this was a waste of time and money.

Para resumir, você ira perder algumas horas em call com seus amigos gritando desesperados enquanto um monstro está tetando comer o seu... corpo. :)

Норм игра для тех, кто готов напрягаться в начале. Здесь высокий порог вхождения, зато потом всё достаточно легко и просто.

Oyunda katillerden kaçıp kurtulmak için jeneratör yapıyoruz 5 tane yapınca kapıyı açmamız gerekiyor. Bunları peşimizde bizden hızlı koşan garip garip iğrenç yetenekleri olan ve sürekli kulağımızda gerilimli kalp sesi gelmesiyle yapmak zorundayız.
Arada anlık çıkabilenler var sizi bağırttıran ve kanser oyuncular tabi ki var siz yakalanınca kurtarmayan ya da katilin sizi asınca başınızda beklemesi gibi. Oyun bulması aşırı uzun sürüyor. (katil olarak) Özel görevler yaparak karakter geliştirmeleri için fazladan kan puanı kasabiliyoruz. Oyunun daha ayrıntısı çok fazla her şeyini buraya yazarsam rehber olacak onun için iyi yanları arkadaşlarınızla çok eğlenebilirsiniz. Katilden kaçıp kurtulmak tatmin edici. Karakter özellikleri ve gelişim süreci güzel. 7.5/10
